description:
Dolce EDP - 75ml: A Floral Masterpiece by Dolce & Gabbana

Experience the captivating allure of Dolce Eau de Parfum, a feminine fragrance that embodies the pure essence of delicate white flowers. This bestselling creation from the iconic fashion house delivers an exquisite blend of freshness and sophistication that's perfect for the modern woman.

The Essence of Dolce & Gabbana Dolce âœ¨

Launched in 2014, Dolce EDP is a masterful composition that captures the elegance of Sicily's white flowers. The fragrance opens with an invigorating burst of neroli leaves and papaya flower, creating a fresh and vibrant introduction. At its heart, a bouquet of white amaryllis, narcissus, and water lily creates a sophisticated floral arrangement that's both timeless and contemporary. The base notes of cashmere wood and musk provide a warm, sensual foundation that lingers beautifully on the skin. ðŸŒ¸

Product Information

Attribute Specification
Size 75ml
Gender Women
Product Type Eau de Parfum
Concentration EDP
Brand Dolce & Gabbana

Fragrance Notes

Note Type Notes
Top Notes Neroli Leaves, Papaya Flower
Heart Notes White Amaryllis, Narcissus, Water Lily
Base Notes Cashmere Wood, Musk

Key Features of Dolce Eau de Parfum ðŸ’Ž

  • Elegant white floral composition with exceptional longevity
  • Signature bottle adorned with a white flower cap and black grosgrain ribbon
  • Perfect for daytime wear and special occasions
  • Moderate sillage that creates a delicate yet noticeable presence
  • Suitable for all seasons, especially spring and summer

The Heritage Behind Dolce by Dolce & Gabbana

Dolce & Gabbana's newest additions to their fragrance collection continue to build on their legendary status in the fashion world. The Dolce EDP was created to embody the pure simplicity and relaxed, personal sensuality of the beautiful white flowers that inspired it. The fragrance represents the emotional and sensory qualities associated with the delicate white flowers that bloom in Sicily, the homeland that has always been a source of inspiration for the designers. ðŸŒ¿

Frequently Asked Question

How long does Dolce EDP last on skin?

Dolce Eau de Parfum offers impressive longevity, typically lasting 6-8 hours on most skin types. The white floral heart notes create a beautiful presence that evolves gracefully throughout the day, while the cashmere wood and musk base notes ensure the fragrance remains detectable even after several hours. For maximum longevity, apply to pulse points and layer with the matching body lotion from the Dolce & Gabbana range. âœ¨

Embrace the delicate femininity and timeless elegance of Dolce EDP by Dolce & Gabbana. This premium fragrance will transport you to a sun-drenched Sicilian garden with every spritz. ðŸ”¥
short_description: Discover Dolce EDP, a sophisticated white floral fragrance from Dolce & Gabbana. This captivating 75ml perfume blends neroli leaves and papaya flower with white amaryllis, narcissus, and water lily, all anchored by sensual cashmere wood and musk. Pure feminine elegance in a bottle.
